text: geudaeneun jasin-ui geojujileul ppajyeo naon jadeul-eul alji moshaneunga? geudeul-eun sucheonmyeong-eulo jug-eum-eul pihalyeo hayeossnola. geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-ege “jug-eula” go malsseumhasyeossgo geuleon hue geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-eul sallisyeossnola. jinsillo hananimkkeseoneun ingan-ege naelyeojin eunhyeui soyujaisina daebubun-ui ingan-eun gamsahaji anhdeola
